key.name: locations
key.summary: Application based configuration

key.name: ignore-top-panel
key.summary: Ignore top panel height

key.name: move-center-only-toggles
key.summary: Move to center onyl toggles maximize flags

key.name: enable-move-workspace
key.summary: Enable move to workspace feature

key.name: corner-changes
key.summary: Change width and height when moving to corner (Always, only height, only width)

key.name: always-use-widths
key.summary: Use multiple widths even if moveing to other screen is possible

key.name: intelligent-corner-movement
key.summary: Moving from E to S moves to SE not S

key.name: always-keep-width
key.summary: Keep width when moving a window to south or north

key.name: always-keep-height
key.summary: Keep width when moving a window to the east or west

key.name: center-width
key.summary: First width to use when moved to center

key.name: center-height
key.summary: First height to use when moved to center

key.name: center-width-1
key.summary: Second width to use when moved to center

key.name: center-height-1
key.summary: Second height to use when moved to center

key.name: center-width-2
key.summary: Third width to use when moved to center

key.name: center-height-2
key.summary: Third height to use when moved to center

key.name: center-keep-width
key.summary: Keep width when moving from center to south or north

key.name: north-height-0
key.summary: Height to use when moving north once

key.name: north-height-1
key.summary: Height to use when moving north twice

key.name: north-height-2
key.summary: Height to use when moving north times

key.name: south-height-0
key.summary: Height to use when moving south once

key.name: south-height-1
key.summary: Height to use when moving south twice

key.name: south-height-2
key.summary: Height to use when moving south times

key.name: left-side-widths-0
key.summary: Width to use when moving to left side once

key.name: left-side-widths-1
key.summary: Width to use when moving to left side twice

key.name: left-side-widths-2
key.summary: Width to use when moving to left side three times

key.name: right-side-widths-0
key.summary: Width to use when moving to right side once

key.name: right-side-widths-1
key.summary: Width to use when moving to right side twice

key.name: right-side-widths-2
key.summary: Width to use when moving to right side three times
